name: Creepy Clown Night Chase 3D
description:
Your hunt starts today, with our stunning Creepy Clown Night Chase 3D game! Be ready to visit the best place for all the teenagers - a large country house - being masked as... a creepy evil clown! Yep, feel like a real horror from the modern comics and movies, sneak into their habitat and scare them all! Prove your clown brothers that you're the best one!

What step will you do first? Let's be quiet and attentive, 'cause these little disgusting creatures have no idea about you hiding here! They will be really scared of your crazy colored face, but don't let them call the police if you want to stay free! You are the main danger here, so make them feel nothing but anxious and fear chasing them!

Be next to invisible - and your efforts will be generously rewarded! Get some useful points to upgrade yourself! Materiality, agility, even the shoe squeakiness - all these stats should be powered up to ease your crazy clown game, so neutralize these teenagers! Check this ultimate Creepy Clown Night Chase 3D game and watch this stunning maniac's side in progress!

Do everything possible not to let them call the police; otherwise, your game will be over with your arrest! Chase the victims with your special clown abilities and transform into their fears - they are not ready to fight you back, 'cause you're so scary!

Creepy Clown Night Chase 3D features:
• Amazing scary clown horror game
• Abandoned country house filled with teenagers
• Interesting clown abilities and stats
• Chance to upgrade your mad skills
• Scary clown quest made in 3D graphics

Become really horrifying master clown playing this stunning Creepy Clown Night Chase 3D game and just enjoy it!
